siteTitle: PrintForge – Commercial 3D printing & laser cutting in NZ

hero.heading: Commercial 3D printing & laser cutting in NZ.
hero.subheading: PrintForge specialises in functional parts, custom one-offs, and 3D printed building components – built for real-world use, not just display.

services.title: 3D Printing
services.description: High-quality 3D printing for functional parts, prototypes and low-volume production.

services.title: Laser Cutting
services.description: Precision cutting and engraving for panels, signage, control plates and small enclosures.

services.title: 3D Printed Buildings
services.description: 3D printed building components and concept models for architectural and construction use.
